raw_body: Loving wife of the late Thiagalingam Parathalingam, beloved daughter of the late R. Doresamy and Nagamma Doresamy, sister of the late D. Tyagarajah, late Leila Rameswaram, late D. Visvadeva and late Devayani, Sinnetamby, darling mother of Sankarshana, Dakshana, Santali, Hiram, Aumanthi, Jaish and the late Ajita, mother-in-law of Anglica, Victor, Paru, Shankar and Adrian, darling grandmother of Anish, Amrisha, Nishkan, Aksha, Arati, Ganeshi, Sach
